subject: Wrists
Surgery and Surgeons
Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Men's tennis became less interesting on Tuesday when Juan Martín del Potro underwent surgery on his right wrist and indicated that he would be out of the game for an extended period.
snippet: Men's tennis became less interesting on Tuesday when Juan Martín del Potro underwent surgery on his right wrist and indicated that he would be out of the game for an extended period.
